original_text: Then she saw the king! He was standing in the king's place beside the pillar in the temple. The army officers and the men with trumpets were standing beside the king. All the people of Judah were shouting with joy. Many of them made music with trumpets.
korean_text: 보매 왕이 규례대로 단 위에 섰고 장관들과 나팔수가 왕의 곁에 모셔 섰으며 온 백성이 즐거워하여 나팔을 부는지라 아달랴가 옷을 찢으며 외치되 반역이로다 반역이로다 하매

sentences.original_text: He was standing in the king's place
beside the pillar in the temple
The army officers and the men with trumpets
All the people of Judah were shouting with joy
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 모든 백성들이 기쁨으로 외치고 있었다

sentences.original_text: Many of them made music with trumpets
sentences.korean_translation: 그중 많은 사람들이 나팔로 음악을 만들었다
